message: I'm excited to offer you this amazing product, and I think it's a great opportunity for you to make a smart investment. I'm willing to sell it to you for $18000.
Thank you for offering the product. I appreciate the opportunity. However, based on my assessment, I am only willing to pay up to $15000 for the product.

I understand that you're interested in the product, but I need to make sure I get a fair price for it. I'm willing to meet you halfway, so I'm counteroffering at $17000. This is a great deal, considering the value the product brings to your business.
I appreciate your counteroffer, but I still believe that $15000 would be a fair price for the product. I hope we can come to an agreement closer to that amount.
